courseOverview: The purpose of this course is to help students find success in life by learning detailed effective strategies for job finding. Starting the job search early is important. The course teaches how to implement the most efficient and successful job search method, providing you with skills needed for future job searches (typically in about 5 years on average).

coursePhilosophy.motivation: Job search is important but easy to procrastinate as there is no real pain until desperation sets in and no instant gratification
coursePhilosophy.structure: Course provides structure to keep moving toward career goals

grading.requirements: Attendance required at all classes; must complete all assignments to receive passing grade

courseOutcomes.description: Students will develop a plan for their academic career that will facilitate obtaining professional employment
Students will be able to professionally communicate relevant interests, skills, and experiences in an interview
Students will learn and implement a proven networking technique for obtaining employment
Students will be familiar with professional expectations in the workplace, including ethics, diversity, and communications

jobSearchMethods.methodology: Combination of 2-Hour Job Search approach and 3B7 networking method
